thread.title: Steph Curry Flexes His Muscles On Offensive End, Gets Laid Out By DeAndre Jordan On A Pick While Playing Defense
thread.title_full: Steph Curry Flexes His Muscles On Offensive End, Gets Laid Out By DeAndre Jordan On A Pick While Playing Defense

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Steph Curry Flexes His Muscles On Offensive End, Gets Laid Out By DeAndre Jordan On A Pick While Playing Defense
text:
Steph Curry might want to think twice before he flexes his muscles against an opponent.
In the second quarter of tonightâ€™s Clippers-Warriors game, Steph Curry flexed on the Clippers only to get laid out by the much bigger and stronger DeAndre Jordan on the other end of the court. 
Eat a little of that humble pie, Steph.
